languages.text: "Хотел проследить, что эти головорезы Калькасара, сторожащие врата, тебя... не потревожат. Всякое случается в Просторе в эти дни. Сам я, конечно, на абордаж уже не пойду, но у меня есть достаточно солдат, которые объяснили бы им, что не надо трогать Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус".

"I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."
languages.original_text: "Хотел проследить, что эти головорезы Калькасара, сторожащие врата, тебя... не потревожат. Всякое случается в Просторе в эти дни. Сам я, конечно, на абордаж уже не пойду, но у меня есть достаточно солдат, которые объяснили бы им, что не надо трогать Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's cutthroats, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “我想确保卡尔卡扎手下的那群混蛋，那群看守大门的家伙，不会……给你添任何麻烦。科罗努斯扩区最近发生了很多事情，我自己恐怕不会再上船了。不过，我手下还有足够的士兵能说服那群混蛋，让他们明白，骚扰冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人是个坏主意。”
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: “我想确保卡尔卡扎手下的那群混蛋，那群看守大门的家伙，不会……给你添任何麻烦。科罗努斯扩区最近发生了很多事情，我自己恐怕不会再上船了。不过，我手下还有足够的士兵能说服那群混蛋，让他们明白，骚扰冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人是个坏主意。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Ich wollte sichergehen, dass Calcazars Schläger, die das Tor bewachen ... Euch keinen Ärger machen. In der Ausdehnung passieren heutzutage die seltsamsten Dinge. Ich werde in Zukunft natürlich selbst keine Schiffe mehr entern, aber ich habe genügend Soldaten, um sie zu überzeugen, dass es eine schlechte Idee ist, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu belästigen."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte sichergehen, dass Calcazars Halsabschneider, die das Tor bewachen ... Euch keinen Ärger machen. In der Ausdehnung passieren heutzutage die seltsamsten Dinge. Ich werde in Zukunft natürlich selbst keine Schiffe mehr entern, aber ich habe genügend Soldaten, um sie zu überzeugen, dass es eine schlechte Idee ist, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu belästigen."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Quería asegurarme de que los matones de Calcazar, esos que custodian el portal, no le... importunasen. En los tiempos que corren, suceden toda clase de cosas en la Extensión. Yo ya no estoy para abordar naves, eso está claro, pero aún dispongo de suficientes soldados para dejarles claro que molestar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius es una muy mala idea».
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: «Quería asegurarme de que los degolladores de Calcazar, esos que custodian el portal, no le... importunasen. En los tiempos que corren, suceden toda clase de cosas en la Extensión. Yo ya no estoy para abordar naves, eso está claro, pero aún dispongo de suficientes soldados para dejarles claro que molestar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius es una muy mala idea».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Je voulais veiller à ce que les sbires de Calcazar, ceux qui gardent le portail... n'entravent pas vos efforts. Il se passe toutes sortes de choses dans les Étendues, ces temps-ci. Bien que je ne sois plus capable de participer aux abordages, j'ai assez de soldats pour convaincre ces scélérats qu'il vaut mieux ne pas s'en prendre {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais veiller à ce que les assassins de Calcazar, ceux qui gardent le portail... n'entravent pas vos efforts. Il se passe toutes sortes de choses dans les Étendues, ces temps-ci. Bien que je ne sois plus capable de participer aux abordages, j'ai assez de soldats pour convaincre ces scélérats qu'il vaut mieux ne pas s'en prendre {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} von Valancius. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「カルカサルのゴロツキども、あの門の番人らがお前に手出ししやしないか確認したくてな。近頃のエクスパンスじゃ何が起こってもおかしくない。もちろん、俺自身が船に乗り込むことはもうないが、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスに嫌がらせをするのは悪手だってわからせるだけの兵士は手元にある」
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: 「カルカサルのゴロツキども、あの門の番人らがお前に手出ししやしないか確認したくてな。近頃のエクスパンスじゃ何が起こってもおかしくない。もちろん、俺自身が船に乗り込むことはもうないが、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスに嫌がらせをするのは悪手だってわからせるだけの兵士は手元にある」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Geçidi koruyan Calcazar'ın haydutlarının sana sorun çıkarmadığından emin olmak istedim. Bu günlerde Enginlik'te türlü türlü şeyler oluyor. Tabii ki gemi bordalayacak değilim ancak onları, Hür Tacir von Valancius'u rahatsız etmenin kötü bir fikir olduğuna ikna edebilecek kadar askerim var."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to make sure Calcazar's thugs, the ones guarding the gate, don't... give you any trouble. All sorts of things happen in the Expanse these days. I won't be boarding any ships myself anymore, of course, but I have enough soldiers to convince them that harassing Rogue Trader von Valancius is a bad idea."

traits.locale_text: "Geçidi koruyan Calcazar haydutlarının sana sorun çıkarmadığından emin olmak istedim. Bu günlerde Enginlik'te türlü türlü şey oluyor. Ben tabii ki kendi başıma gemiye binemem artık ama onları Hür Tacir von Valancius'u rahatsız etmenin kötü bir fikir olduğuna ikna edebilecek kadar askerim var."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
